G

GameBoard - Class in com.ning.breakout.view
GameBoard is the class that integrates classes GameBoardFactory, GameBoardManager and GameStatusBar.
GameBoard() - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoard
The constructor initializes the game objects and animates the game.
GameBoardFactory - Class in com.ning.breakout.view
GameBoardFactory is the class takes the responsibility of producing the image as the source of the view of the game objects, which used to show the game board with different color theme.
GameBoardFactory() - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardFactory
 
GameBoardManager - Class in com.ning.breakout.view
GameBoardManager is the class which takes the responsibility of controlling some game objects (ball, paddle and bricks) and store the status info of the game.
GameBoardManager(Rectangle, int, int, double, Point2D) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardManager
The class constructor specifies the boundary of the game board, creates game objects and initializes the game status info.
GameEndMenuController - Class in com.ning.breakout.controller
The controller class of the game end menu, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the game end menu.
GameEndMenuController() - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.controller.GameEndMenuController
 
GameSceneController - Class in com.ning.breakout.controller
Abstract class GameSceneController is the base class for those controller classes whose scene is the sub-scene of the game board.
GameSceneController() - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.controller.GameSceneController
Sole constructor.
GameSoundFactory - Class in com.ning.breakout.view
GameSoundFactory is the class provides game media players.
GameSoundFactory() - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.GameSoundFactory
The class constructor initializes and sets the source of the media players.
GameStatusBar - Class in com.ning.breakout.view
GameStatusBar is the class visualizes the game status info.
GameStatusBar() - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.GameStatusBar
The class constructor initializes and sets the lay out of the ImageView and Label objects which used to visualize the ball count, level, brick count of the game, and adds these Javafx objects into a new container (which will be added to the bigger container in the game board to display the game status info).

GoldenBrick - Class in com.ning.breakout.view.graphics
Golden brick is the concrete class extends from the abstract class CrackedBrick, with full strength of 4.
GoldenBrick(BrickModel, Group) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.GoldenBrick
The class constructor sets the model and the view container of the golden brick, binds the layout of the view of the golden brick with the model, adds the view to the container, specifies the number of effective impacts the golden brick can withstand and initializes the crack array of the golden brick by calling the constructor of super class.
GuidanceController - Class in com.ning.breakout.controller
The controller class of the guidance scene, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the guidance scene.
GuidanceController() - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.controller.GuidanceController
